CSSDimension.summary: The <dimension> CSS data type represents a {{CSSxRef("<number>")}} with a unit attached to it, for example 10px.

remarks.para: CSS uses dimensions to specify distances ({{CSSxRef("<length>")}}), durations ({{CSSxRef("<time>")}}), frequencies ({{CSSxRef("<frequency>")}}), resolutions ({{CSSxRef("<resolution>")}}), and other quantities.
